news.title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin
news.summary: The agency already opened an investigation in October over Waymo's performance around school buses. Waymo said it issued a software update to its fleet to improve performance.

news.title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
news.summary: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

news.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head
news.summary: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

news.title: Anthropic CEO weighs in on AI bubble talk and risk-taking among competitors
news.summary: Anthropic's CEO shared his thoughts on the economics of AI and the risk-taking of competitors, saying some were "YOLO-ing" with regard to spending.

news.title: Musk says new Tesla software allows texting and driving, which is illegal in most states
news.summary: Texting while driving is banned in nearly every state, even with the use of advanced driver-assistance systems like Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) software.

news.title: Apple announces even more major executive turnover
news.summary: Following the recent retirement of former COO Jeff Williams, AI chief John Giannandrea stepping down, and the departure of head of design Alan Dye for Meta, Apple announced Thursday that environmental and policy lead Lisa Jackson is retiring and that Jennifer Newstead will replace Kate Adams as the

news.title: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Mario Kart bundle is on sale at Amazon again for $50 off
news.summary: One of the biggest surprises of Cyber Monday was the terrific discount we saw on the Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle, which dropped in price by $50. We expected the price to return to normal once the shopping holiday ended, but to our surprise, it’s still going strong two days later. Sever

news.title: Pentagon’s Signalgate report finds Pete Hegseth violated military policies
news.summary: It has been months since a group of Trump administration officials put together a Signal group chat to discuss classified military intelligence ahead of a military strike in Yemen while inadvertently adding a journalist, and now the Pentagon’s inspector general has released its report on the mess. news.title: Trump invites ‘cute’ Japanese kei trucks to come to America
news.summary: Tiny kei trucks from Japan have a new fan: President Donald Trump. news.title: Metroid Prime 4 doesn’t stand up to Nintendo’s best
news.summary: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is finally out after a long and difficult development - and despite some bright spots, the game really shows its age. news.title: Congress warned that NASA’s current plan for Artemis “cannot work”
news.summary: "The Artemis III mission and those beyond should be canceled."

news.title: In comedy of errors, men accused of wiping gov databases turned to an AI tool
news.summary: Defendants were convicted of similar crimes a decade ago. How were they cleared again?

news.title: Engineer proves that Kohler’s smart toilet cameras aren’t very private
news.summary: Kohler is getting the scoop on people's poop.

news.title: CDC vaccine panel realizes again it has no idea what it’s doing, delays big vote
news.summary: Today's meeting was chaotic and included garbage anti-vaccine presentations.

news.title: Researchers find what makes AI chatbots politically persuasive
news.summary: A massive study of political persuasion shows AIs have, at best, a weak effect.

news.title: It's Time to Save Silicon Valley From Itself
news.summary: Big Tech has lost its way. At WIRED’s Big Interview event, Techdirt editor Mike Masnick and Common Tools CEO Alex Komoroske announced a manifesto designed to help the industry get back on track.

news.title: Meta Poached Apple’s Top Design Guys to Fix Its Software UI
news.summary: Meta wants to make its AI hardware slicker and more fashion-forward. It also needs to make its software more usable. The way to do all that appears to be hiring design maestros away from Apple.

news.title: Circle’s Jeremy Allaire: We’re Building an ‘Economic OS’ for the AI Era
news.summary: The cofounder and CEO of Circle says “money as an app platform” is the next step in a digital-based global economic system that’s right around the corner.

news.title: Former DOGE Engineer Is Now Back in Government
news.summary: Sahil Lavingia, previously a DOGE operative at the Department of Veterans Affairs, is now a career employee at the IRS. He said at WIRED's Big Interview event that he expects to work there 10 years.

news.title: ‘Signalgate’ Inspector General Report Wants Just One Change to Avoid a Repeat Debacle
news.summary: The United States Inspector General report reviewing Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth’s text messaging mess recommends a single change to keep classified material secure.
